string-array.name: FAQanswers
string-array.item: Yes you can. You can do that by selecting the option "Change department" under the navigation drawer
Yes of course you can post question/reply to questions in other departments as well
Yes if the post is created by you. Long press on a post to delete the post.
Yes you can by clicking forgot password in the login screen.
If you just click on any question, automatically the replies for that question will be shown
Yes. You can do that by selecting the option "LogOut" under the navigation drawer
First select "Post Query" under the navigation drawer. The type in your question in the screen that appears and click on "Submit" button

string-array.name: AboutUs
string-array.item: • Hawks Forum is a platform where current and alumni students of Illinois Institute of Technology(IIT) can interact with each other.
• You can post your questions on subjects,career,etc.
• Feel free to reply any question posted by other students.
• Questions and answers are categorized department wise.
• You can view/post questions of any department.
• Explore the side navigation drawer for options.
• Please refer the FAQs under side navigation panel if you have doubts.
